channel.name: MSNBC US
channel.title: Andrew Young: The Dirty Work
channel.desc: Revealing the untold story of Andrew Young, a behind the scenes force of the Civil Rights Movement and a quiet giant of international diplomacy; a master negotiator, strategist, and bridge builder, Young was the man who did the essential, often thankless "dirty work" that changed history, operating in the shadows while others stood in the spotlight.
